readable.title: 3105929913_94a6882e25
readable.content: Four bald people are praying or meditating . Four people with shaved heads and white robes pose their hands in prayer . Four people with shaved heads and white robes praying . Religious people wearing white with bald heads hold their hands in a praying position . Two bald men and two bald women dressed in all white standing in a prayer pose .
